content_schema_t.title: CSAF Extension Content $schema Type
content_schema_t.description: Contains the actual value of the $schema property.

$schema.title: CSAF Extension Metaschema
$schema.description: Contains the URL of the CSAF Extension Metaschema JSON schema which the JSON schema promises to be valid for.

$id.title: CSAF Extension Schema ID
$id.description: Contains the ID as URL of the CSAF Extension JSON schema which identifies the CSAF Extension Schema.

title.title: Title of the CSAF Extension
title.description: Contains the title for the CSAF Extension Schema.

description.title: Description of the CSAF Extension
description.description: Contains the description for the CSAF Extension Schema detailing what the CSAF Extension is about.

type.title: Type of CSAF Extension Schema
type.description: Contains the type of the CSAF Extension Schema which is always `object`.

required.title: CSAF Extension Schema Required Properties
required.description: Contains the list of required properties.

properties.title: CSAF Extension Schema Properties
properties.description: Contains the definition of the properties a CSAF Extension Schema needs.

$schema.title: CSAF Extension Schema
$schema.description: Contains the definition of the object of the CSAF Extension JSON schema which the JSON object promises to be valid for.

title.title: Title of the CSAF Extension $schema value
title.description: Contains the title for the CSAF Extension $schema.

description.title: Description of the CSAF Extension $schema value
description.description: Contains the description for the CSAF Extension $schema value.
description.default: Contains the URL of the CSAF Extension JSON schema which the JSON object promises to be valid for.

type.title: Type of the CSAF Extension $schema value
type.description: Contains the type of the $schema value which is `string`.

format.title: Format of the CSAF Extension $schema value
format.description: Contains the format of the $schema value which is `uri`.

const.title: CSAF Extension $schema value
const.description: Contains the actual value of the $schema property.

pattern.title: CSAF Extension $schema pattern
pattern.description: Contains the pattern for value of the $schema property.

category.title: CSAF Extension Category
category.description: Contains the definition of the object of the CSAF Extension Category.

title.title: Title of the CSAF Extension Category value
title.description: Contains the title for the CSAF Extension category.

description.title: Description of the CSAF Extension Category value
description.description: Contains the description for the CSAF Extension category value.
description.default: Holds the category of the extension content.

type.title: Type of the CSAF Extension Category value
type.description: Contains the type of the category value which is `string`.

enum.title: Options of the CSAF Extension Category value
enum.description: Contains the possible options for the category.

critical.title: CSAF Extension Critical
critical.description: Contains the definition of the object of the CSAF Extension critical.

title.title: Title of the CSAF Extension Critical value
title.description: Contains the title for the CSAF Extension critical.

description.title: Description of the CSAF Extension Critical value
description.description: Contains the description for the CSAF Extension critical value.
description.default: Determines whether using the extension would fail a mandatory test.

type.title: Type of the CSAF Extension Critical value
type.description: Contains the type of the critical value which is `boolean`.

default.title: Default of the CSAF Extension Critical value
default.description: Contains the default of the critical value - either `true` or `false`.

const.title: Constant value of the CSAF Extension Critical value
const.description: Contains the only allowed value of the critical value as defined by the CSAF Extension Schema - either `true` or `false`.

content.title: CSAF Extension Content
content.description: Contains the definition of the object of the CSAF Extension content.

title.title: Title of the CSAF Extension Content object
title.description: Contains the title for the CSAF Extension content.

description.title: Description of the CSAF Extension Content object
description.description: Contains the description for the CSAF Extension content object.
description.default: Contains the additional information in its properties.

type.title: Type of the CSAF Extension Content object
type.description: Contains the type of the content object which is `object`.

minProperties.title: Minimum count of properties of the CSAF Extension Content object
minProperties.description: Contains the number of properties within the `object`.

unevaluatedProperties.title: Unevaluated properties of the CSAF Extension Content object
unevaluatedProperties.description: Contains the fact that no properties can be unevaluated within the CSAF Extension Content object.

additionalProperties.title: CSAF Extension Schema Required Properties
additionalProperties.description: Prohibits additional properties on this level.
